cck_speed.help: Experimentally found CCK speed in Hz

aux_mount_point.help: Mount point for the auxiliary storage

scratch_dir.help: Scratch directory in the auxiliary storage

audio_dir.help: Audio storage directory in the auxiliary storage

sfx_dir.help: Audio effects directory in the auxiliary storage

MusicPlayer.audio_buf_bank_size.help: Size of the audio buffer bank in samples (uint32_t). 1 << 9 == 512 seems to be the lower limit, after which it becomes crunchy again.

MusicPlayer.default_pcm_rate.help: Default PCM rate for the music player.
